meta.title: Sleep & Dreams - CPAP Apnea Monitor Dreams Log Diary | Feeltracker
meta.description: Improve your sleep with AI-powered dream analysis, CPAP therapy monitoring, and relaxation tools. Log sleep times, monitor patterns, sync with Apple Health, analyze dreams, and track CPAP metrics. Better rest starts with better tracking.
meta.ogTitle: Sleep & Dreams | Track Sleep Patterns with AI | Feeltracker
meta.ogDescription: Track sleep with AI dream analysis, CPAP therapy monitoring, relaxation tools, and Apple Health integration.
meta.twitterDescription: Track sleep with AI dream analysis, CPAP therapy monitoring, and relaxation tools.

hero.title: Sleep & Dreams
hero.privacy: No Ads ¬∑ No Tracking ¬∑ Privacy First
hero.subtitle: Track your sleep patterns and discover what affects your sleep quality. Features AI-powered dream analysis, CPAP therapy monitoring, relaxation tools, and Apple Health integration to help you get better rest.
hero.ctaAlt: Download Sleep & Dreams on App Store
hero.platformInfo:
Free app with optional premium features
iPhone, iPad & Mac ‚Ä¢ iOS 16.0+

screenshots.title: See Feeltracker for Sleep & Dreams in Action

items.title: Simple Sleep Logging
items.description: Log your sleep and wake times in seconds. No complex forms or sensors required. Just tap to record when you went to bed and when you woke up.

items.title: Automatic Duration
items.description: Sleep duration is calculated automatically from your sleep and wake times. See exactly how many hours you got each night at a glance.

items.title: Apple Health Integration
items.description: Sync with Apple Health's sleep data. Import sleep tracked by your Apple Watch or other apps, and save your manual entries to HealthKit.

items.title: AI Sleep Insights
items.description: Discover what affects your sleep quality. AI analyzes your notes to identify factors like caffeine, exercise, screen time, or stress that impact your rest.

items.title: Dream Analysis
items.description: AI-powered dream interpretation with symbol meanings, emotional insights, and psychological analysis. Perfect for tracking recurring dreams and understanding their significance.

items.title: CPAP Therapy Support
items.description: Comprehensive CPAP analysis with AHI tracking, mask fit assessment, leak detection, and personalized recommendations to optimize your sleep apnea therapy.

items.title: Visual Sleep Charts
items.description: See your sleep patterns with intuitive charts and graphs. Track trends over weeks and months to understand your sleep cycles.

items.title: Sleep Notes
items.description: Add notes about your day - what you ate, drank, or did before bed. These help you identify what promotes or disrupts good sleep.

items.title: Relaxation Tools
items.description: AI-generated calming content with breathing exercises, peaceful visualizations, and personalized relaxation techniques to help you fall asleep faster.

howItWorks.title: How Sleep & Dreams Works
howItWorks.subtitle: A complete sleep tracking solution to help you understand and improve your rest

steps.title: 1. Log Sleep Times
steps.content:
**Quick Entry:** Each morning, enter when you went to bed and when you woke up. The app automatically calculates your total sleep duration, so you don't have to do the math.

**Multiple Entries:** Track naps and multiple sleep sessions per day. Perfect for shift workers, parents with interrupted sleep, or anyone with non-traditional sleep schedules.

**Detailed Notes:** Record sleep quality ratings, dreams, nightmares, how you felt waking up, and any factors that affected your rest - caffeine intake, exercise timing, room temperature, stress levels, screen time before bed, or medications. The more details you add, the better AI can identify patterns.

steps.title: 2. Review Patterns
steps.content:
**Calendar View:** See your entire sleep history in an intuitive calendar interface. Each day displays sleep duration with color-coded indicators showing whether you met your sleep goals.

**Sleep Statistics:** Automatically calculated metrics include average sleep duration, total sleep time per week, sleep deficit/surplus, most consistent sleep schedule days, and trends over time. Identify your best and worst nights at a glance.

**Visual Trends:** Charts show your sleep patterns over days, weeks, or months. See how your bedtime and wake time vary, spot irregular patterns, and track progress toward consistent sleep schedules.

steps.title: 3. Get AI Insights
steps.content:
**Pattern Recognition:** AI analyzes your notes to identify what affects your sleep. Discover correlations like "You sleep 45 minutes longer on nights when you exercise" or "Sleep quality is worse when you have caffeine after 2 PM."

**Personalized Tips:** Get specific recommendations based on your data. AI might suggest optimal bedtimes based on when you consistently get the best sleep, or highlight factors that repeatedly disrupt your rest.

**Sleep Chat:** Ask natural language questions about your sleep data: "How many hours did I average last week?" or "Show me all nights where I got less than 6 hours." Get instant, conversational answers from your sleep history.

steps.title: 4. Improve Your Sleep
steps.content:
**Actionable Data:** Use insights to make evidence-based changes to your routine. Test hypotheses like "Will reading before bed improve my sleep?" by tracking outcomes and letting AI spot the differences.

**Professional Reports:** Export PDF or Excel reports for sleep specialists, doctors, or CPAP therapy consultations. Reports include sleep duration graphs, quality trends, notes about sleep disruptions, and statistical summaries formatted for medical review.

**Apple Health Sync:** Integrate with Apple Health to combine manual logs with automatic sleep tracking from Apple Watch or other devices. Import historical sleep data or export your logs to HealthKit for a complete health picture.

items.question: How much sleep do I need?
items.answer: Most adults need 7-9 hours of sleep per night, though individual needs vary. The app helps you track your sleep duration and identify your personal optimal amount based on how you feel.

items.question: Does this app automatically track sleep?
items.answer: No. Unlike Apple Watch or other wearables, Sleep Diary requires manual logging. You enter your sleep and wake times each morning. However, you can import sleep data from Apple Health if you use other automatic tracking devices.

items.question: Can I log naps?
items.answer: Yes. You can log multiple sleep periods per day, including naps. Each entry shows duration, and the calendar displays all your sleep/wake times.

items.question: What's the difference between this and Apple Health?
items.answer: Sleep Diary provides a dedicated interface for sleep tracking with features specifically designed for managing sleep patterns - notes, AI insights, trends, and easy manual logging. It integrates with Apple Health but offers more detailed sleep-focused features.

items.question: How does AI help with sleep insights?
items.answer: When you add notes about your day (e.g., "had coffee at 8pm" or "exercised in the morning"), AI analyzes these over time to show correlations with your sleep duration and quality. This helps identify what promotes or disrupts good sleep.

items.question: Can I share sleep data with my doctor?
items.answer: Yes. Export your sleep history as PDF or Excel reports to share with healthcare providers. This is particularly useful if you're being evaluated for sleep disorders or insomnia.

items.question: Does it track sleep quality or just duration?
items.answer: The app primarily tracks sleep duration (hours slept) based on your logged sleep and wake times. You can add notes about sleep quality, dreams, or how rested you feel, which helps with qualitative tracking.

items.question: Is there a reminder to log sleep?
items.answer: Yes. You can set daily reminders to log your sleep times. Many users set a morning reminder to prompt them to record the previous night's sleep.

items.question: Do you show ads or track me?
items.answer:
**No.** We've completely removed all advertisements from the app. We don't track you across other apps or websites, and we never sell your data to advertisers.

Your data syncs via iCloud - just like Apple Notes and Photos. This means we don't need to know your email address, name, or any personal information. Your sleep data is stored on your devices and in your iCloud account, and it's completely private whether you use the free version or premium.

items.question: Do I need a subscription?
items.answer: The app is completely free to download and use. All core tracking features work without a subscription. A premium subscription unlocks advanced AI features, unlimited exports, and enhanced customization. You can try all premium features during the free trial period.

reviews.title: What Users Are Saying
reviews.subtitle: Real reviews from the App Store

items.title: Calling all sleep Docs!
items.content: I was so surprised that my Sleep doctor was trying to give me pieces of paper to record my sleep hours with no way to even collate them!? When I asked for an app, they suggested consensus Sleep Diary, which is useless. Luckily I found this app and I immediately asked my Sleep doctor to start recommending it. I also appreciate how responsive the developer is. Clearly this person wants to improve lives. THANK YOU!!
items.author: Jbobthebuilder

items.title: Love this app!! So easy to use.
items.content: First off, please let me say, ignore the username that you see on here for me. That was an error I made early on and can't seem to change without a Mac computer, according to Apple. Now getting down to reviewing this app. This app is awesome for monitoring your sleep habits, time and being able to make notes for future reference. It's simple and easy to use. I had a suggestion, something I was hoping to have changed, and the app developer Gaurav was absolutely amazing!! I reached out to him, and he got back to me within minutes and within days he actually added my suggestion! I highly recommend using this to keep a record of your sleep patterns. And it's absolutely worth subscribing to. Gaurav Sharma, you are a rockstar!!
items.author: Absolutely Annoyed!

items.title: Good app for tracking sleep patterns
items.content: I needed something to help with sleep tracking as I was starting CPAP therapy back in November 2022. This app has been great at keeping me accountable to a schedule and looking at my progress. I can track hours slept, dreams I have had, patterns of sleep as well as other data that I want to review. Only issue is sometimes App does not open right away on my IPAD and have to force close it and then re-open it. Update - have used app 400 nights now and it shows me progress I've made in my CPAP therapy and a lot of useful insights!
items.author: Gadget guy Fl

items.title: Free with full functionality except for ads
items.content: That's all it took to make the difference between 2 and 5 stars for me. However, if this changes, then so will this review :) thank you for this amazing app.
items.author: Kye_53636

items.title: n/a
items.content: i try to log 0 hrs of sleep and it won't save my tracking. Also the questions don't allow for tracking 0 sleep, with questions like 'how long did it take to fall asleep' and no option to say you haven't slept. Edit: Yes I see how to log it correctly now, thank you for responding
items.author: ha Anzy

items.title: Awesome!
items.content: This sleep journal is perfect for what I needed. It's well designed and easy to use. Thank you so much developers for making it free
items.author: Naamyri

items.title: Very useful app! Great support!
items.content: I've been using this app for a few weeks because I sleep very irregular hours and found it hard to keep track of my sleep time. Sleep Journal was just what I needed. At one point I found a bug in how multiple entries per day were being totaled. I reported it to the developer who not only replied quickly to me and kept me aware of his progress but also had the big fixed in just a few days. Thanks Gaurav!
items.author: AnotherOldGuy

items.title: Straightforward and reliable
items.content: This is the most convenient way to keep a consistent record of your sleep schedule and identify habits that can be affecting your sleep. You really don't need any other app
items.author: Tab Munch
